pages.text: If you want to sleep through the day and wake up fresh for a night stroll, take a nap on a $(item)Hammock$(), you'll wake up straight at nightfall$(br2)To set the hammock up, you'll need to get some $(item)Rope and Nail$(), see the next page for assembly instructions. Additionally, you can make a hammock with any color of wool you desire.

pages.title: Assembling
pages.text: $(li)Place two pillars, four blocks apart.$(li)Attach $(item)Rope and Nail$() to each pillar.$(li)Right click with your $(item)Hammock$() in either rope block.$(li)Enjoy!
